title: Add critical golden-path smoke for full first-slice loop including attack resolve
description: Add a release-blocking smoke path that verifies the full first-slice loop (tick, build, train, map interaction, hostile dispatch, deterministic combat resolve, event feed output) using scoped checks only.
acceptance_criteria: A single scoped smoke command validates first-slice loop prerequisites through hostile attack resolve and fails when required loop stages are missing.
Smoke output records deterministic pass/fail evidence for each mandatory loop stage defined in vertical-slice done gate.
Validation remains scoped to critical release path and avoids broad unrelated full-suite execution.

title: Run release-blocking slice gate evidence pass after manifest and wrapper hardening
description: Execute a critical release-path QA pass that captures evidence for playable/quality/platform gates after wrapper command hardening and manifest-bound backend/frontend integration are complete.
acceptance_criteria: Critical golden-path smoke command runs and records deterministic stage evidence for tick/build/train/map/hostile resolve/event feed.
Steam and Android wrapper prepare-mode commands are verified in the same gate pass (or produce explicit actionable blocked reason).
Gate output summarizes PASS/FAIL for playable, quality, and platform gates with artifact links for daemon operators.

title: Normalize backend seed-loader TypeScript ESM specifiers for strip-types test execution
description: Unblock direct `node --experimental-strip-types --test` execution for seed loader tests by standardizing local TypeScript import specifiers (or introducing a tested loader runtime shim) so module resolution is deterministic without ad-hoc flags.
acceptance_criteria: Seed loader test files under `backend/src/app/config/seeds/v1` run via `node --experimental-strip-types --test` without `ERR_MODULE_NOT_FOUND`.
No functional behavior changes in seed parsing/filtering outputs; only import/runtime compatibility updates.
Validation command(s) are documented in the updated outbox entry for reproducibility.

title: Fix narrative event seed token ordering mismatch for passive gain reasoned message
description: Resolve the existing validation failure in `event-feed-messages.json` by aligning the `event.tick.passive_gain_reasoned` token list order with template placeholder order so the baseline narrative seed loader test suite passes cleanly.
acceptance_criteria: `event.tick.passive_gain_reasoned` row token order matches template placeholder order exactly.
`node --experimental-strip-types --test --test-concurrency=1 --test-isolation=none backend/src/app/config/seeds/v1/narrative-seed-loaders.test.ts` passes without failures related to token mismatch.
